import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import { AuthContext } from "../Context/ContextProvider" function Account() { const context = useContext(AuthContext) const { login, loginUser, registration } = context console.log(loginUser) const [request, setRequest] = useState(false) const [payment, setPayment] = useState(false) const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [mobile, setMobile] = useState("") const [Num, setNum] = useState(1) const handleRegister = () => { const obj = { name, email, mobile, class: Number(Num) } registration(obj) } return ( login ?
loginUser
: request ?
setName(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setMobile(e.target.value)} />
: payment ?
setName(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setMobile(e.target.value)} />

) } export default Account
